title: What Really Happened to the Class of '65?
overview: Dramatizations that update the lives of the 1965 graduating class of the fictitious Bret Harte High School in Los Angeles. Stories open with a commentary by Sam Ashley, a '65 graduate who now teaches at the old school, as he recalls his fellow classmates. The program then chronicles the life of the particular classmate from 1965 to 1977.
